PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07802010-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCertain Recreational Camps Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER remitting $319,354.50 to CERTAIN RECREATIONAL CAMPS. The amount represents goods and services tax (GST)/harmonized sales tax (HST) collectible plus related penalties and interest in repect of recreational camp fees for the period beginning on September 16, 1998 and ending on December 18, 2006.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2010-0047 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Certain Recreational Camps Remission Order
precis: REMISSION ORDER remitting $319,354.50 to CERTAIN RECREATIONAL CAMPS.  The amount represents goods and services tax (GST)/harmonized sales tax (HST) collectible plus related penalties and interest in repect of recreational camp fees for the period beginning on September 16, 1998 and ending on December 18, 2006.
